Quasar:




When the group traveled back to the mountain, Quasar kept some short 
distance behind, a little uncertain about the battle. Had they won? 
She kept her rifle in her hand and stayed out side. She looked around 
the area, looking if she was keeping guard. She was a little 
overwhelmed about the fight. She felt a little ashamed of herself, 
not fighting as strong as the others.
